changeSet.author: irazin
changeSet.comment: Insert AVERAGE_RUN_CONTROL_NOR metric for Signatera Plasma pipeline
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`qc_type` (`category`, `description`, `name`, `ismultisample`) VALUES ('SEQUENCING_RUN', 'Average of total amplicon reads from 8 run controls', 'AVERAGE_RUN_CONTROL_NOR', 0);
